info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:21PM CDT until July 01 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Clinton County in south central Illinois... Bond County in south central Illinois... South central Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 421 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Worden to near Marine to near Trenton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Breese, Carlyle, Trenton, Aviston, St. Rose, Pocahontas, Coffeen, Mulberry Grove, Tamalco, Sorento, Beaver Creek, Woburn, Van Burensburg, Reno, Jamestown, Pleasant Mound, Pierron, Keyesport, and Panama. This includes Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 36 and 52. This also includes Carlyle Lake Recreational Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
